CheckTitle: Ensure RAM password policy require at least one number
Description: RAM password policies can be used to ensure password complexity. It is recommended that the password policy require at least one number.
Risk: Enhancing complexity of a password policy increases account resiliency against brute force logon attempts.

Recommendation.Text: Logon to RAM console. Choose Settings. In the Password section, click Modify. In the Charset section, select Number and click OK.

Notes: This check aligns with CIS Alibaba Cloud Foundations Benchmark v2.0.0 - Section 1.10
